raw: Tony Morgan obituary .
replaced: Tony obituary .

raw: My friend and colleague Tony Morgan , who has died aged 83 after contracting Covid-19 , was one of the heroes of the early days of computers .
replaced: Tony , was one of the heroes of the early days of computers .

raw: As a computer engineer from the late 1950s , he was responsible for the installation of the pioneering Leo computers worldwide , including for the GPO ( now BT ) for telephone billing .
replaced: As a computer engineer from the late 1950s , Tony was responsible for the installation of These advanced business computers  Leo computers worldwide , including for the GPO ( now BT ) for telephone billing .

raw: After a 38 - year career he remained an active member of the Leo Heritage Project , using his unrivalled knowledge to identify the company ’s artefacts .
replaced: After a 38 - year career Tony remained an active member of the Heritage Project , using Tony unrivalled knowledge to identify the company ’s artefacts .

raw: Born in Kenton , near Harrow , Middlesex , to William Morgan , an architect , and Millie ( nee Ferguson ) , Tony went to Harrow County grammar school and , after getting four A - levels , did his national service with the RAF , where he was trained as an air - radar fitter .
replaced: Born in Kenton , near Harrow , Middlesex , to William Morgan , an architect , and Millie ( nee Ferguson ) , Tony went to Harrow County grammar school and , after getting four A - levels , did Tony national service with the RAF , where Tony was trained as an air - radar fitter .

raw: When at school he had heard a radio broadcast about the original Lyons – of Corner House teashop fame - collaboration with Cambridge University to build the Leo ( Lyons Electronic Office ) computer , and the resultant world ’s first business data processing application being run in 1951 .
replaced: When at school Tony had heard a radio broadcast about the original Lyons – of Corner House teashop fame - collaboration with Cambridge University to build the Leo ( Lyons Electronic Office ) computer , and the resultant world ’s first business data processing application being run in 1951 .

raw: This had fired Tony ’s imagination , and after demob he joined Leo Computers in 1957 as a trainee engineer .
replaced: This had fired Tony ’s imagination , and after demob Tony joined Leo Computers in 1957 as a trainee engineer .

raw: He was moved to work on the first Leo II before completing the course , progressing to shift leader and , as a result of his skill and understanding of the technology , to chief commissioning engineer by 1964 .
replaced: Tony was moved to work on the first Leo II before completing the course , progressing to shift leader and , as a result of Tony skill and understanding of the technology , to chief commissioning engineer by 1964 .

raw: The role of commissioning engineers in the 1960s and 70s was demanding : in those days there was a single engineer responsible for commissioning each system .
replaced: The role of commissioning engineers in the 1960s and 70s was demanding : in those days there This a single engineer responsible for commissioning each system .

raw: This required management skills to manage the supporting team of engineers , operators and support staff as well as leading all stages from understanding the configuration , testing all units and the operating system , and passing a formal factory acceptance test based on the stringent requirements of the standard government contracts .
replaced: This required management skills to manage the supporting team of engineers , operators and support staff as well as leading all stages from understanding the configuration , testing all units and the operating system , and passing a formal factory acceptance test based on the stringent requirements of the standard government contracts .

raw: In 1964 , Tony took over management of commissioning the Leo III computer range of what was by that time English Electric Leo .
replaced: In 1964 , Tony took over management of commissioning the Leo computer range of what was by that time English Electric Leo .

raw: Over the next four years he led the introduction of the faster Leo 326 machines that initially went to the GPO ( now BT ) for telephone billing and premium bonds , one of the largest single computer orders ever at that time .
replaced: Over the next four years Tony led the introduction of the faster Leo 326 machines that initially went to the GPO  BT ) for telephone billing and premium bonds , one of the largest single computer orders ever at that time .

raw: These advanced business computers were bought by large companies , government and overseas customers .
replaced: These advanced business computers were bought by large companies , government and overseas customers .

raw: When Leo was incorporated in the newly formed International Computers Limited in 1968 , Tony moved into product planning , specifying new machines .
replaced: When Leo was incorporated in the newly formed International Computers Limited in 1968 , Tony moved into product planning , specifying new machines .

raw: From the mid-70s he worked for the department responsible for selling and supporting systems to the GPO but was still called on to troubleshoot “ difficult ” service problems .
replaced: From the mid-70s Leo worked for the department responsible for selling and supporting systems to the GPO but was still called on to troubleshoot “ difficult ” service problems .

raw: From 1981 he worked in ICL ’s customer service HQ monitoring the performance of all the UK customers ’ systems .
replaced: From 1981 Leo worked in ICL ’s customer service HQ monitoring the performance of all the UK customers ’ systems .

raw: Tony took early retirement in 1995 but continued to work with the Heritage Project in the rescue and identification of computer artefacts , and advised on two books , User Driven Innovation ( 1996 ) , edited by David Caminer and Leo , The First Business Computer ( 1994 ) , by Peter Bird .
replaced: Tony took early retirement in 1995 but continued to work with the Heritage Project in the rescue and identification of computer artefacts , and advised on two books , User Driven Innovation ( 1996 ) , edited by David Caminer and Leo , The First Business Computer ( 1994 ) , by Peter Bird .

raw: As well as a demanding job , Tony was very sociable , and lived a full life with a wide range of activities .
replaced: As well as a demanding job , Tony was very sociable , and lived a full life with a wide range of activities .

raw: He played rugby for Lyons / Centaurs until he was 42 and continued as treasurer and club secretary for a further 25 years .
replaced: Tony played rugby for Lyons / Centaurs until Tony was 42 and continued as treasurer and club secretary for a further 25 years .

raw: His passion was Formula One and he detailed records of all races for over 50 years .
replaced: Tony passion was Formula One and Tony detailed records of all races for over 50 years .

raw: Keen on jazz , he attended dance weekends until arthritis stopped it .
replaced: Keen on jazz , Tony attended dance weekends until arthritis stopped Formula One .

raw: He is survived by his sister , Hilary .
replaced: Tony is survived by Tony sister , Hilary .
